nodes.text: The Ufsa family was one of the Nine Ruling Families within the Aristocra of the Chiss Ascendancy.

Mid Captain Ufsa'mak'ro, first officer of Mitth'raw'nuruodo's flagship the Springhawk, held the rank of cousin of the Ufsa family. After the militarily successful but politically disastrous Vagaari pirate operations, the Ufsa family Syndics covertly exchanged favors with members of the Defense Hierarchy Council to transfer command of the Springhawk from Senior Captain Thrawn to Samakro, although Thrawn's command of the Springhawk was restored not long after.
